item.title: Data Visualization with R - Box Plots
item.description:
This is the sixth post in the series Data Visualization With R. In the previous post, we learnt how to build bar plots. In this post, we will learn about box plots.

Introduction

Box plot (also known as box and whisker plots) is a exploratory graphic
